# SRMediaEventType.onScreen

**Case**

An event that occurs when the media appears on the screen.

## Declaration

```swift
case onScreen
```

## Event types

- **SRMediaEventType.offScreen**: An event that occurs when the media disappears from the screen.

items.description: An event that occurs when the media disappears from the screen.
items.name: SRMediaEventType.offScreen
